metadata.title: CVE-2015-6806 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The MScrollV function in ansi.c in GNU screen 4.3.1 and earlier does notproperly limit recursion, which allows remote attackers to cause a denialof service (stack consumption) via an escape sequence with a large repeatcount value.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-6806` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

screen - 4.3.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: screen package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.1-2').
